00007 #include "ORVBasicTreeDecoder.hh"

00009 class ORCaen792qdcDecoder : public ORVBasicTreeDecoder
00010 {
00011   public:
00012     ORCaen792qdcDecoder();
00013     virtual ~ORCaen792qdcDecoder() {}
00014 
00015     virtual size_t NValuesOf(UInt_t* record);
00016     virtual inline UInt_t IthChannelOf(UInt_t* record, size_t iRow)
00017       { return (GetLocPtr(record, iRow)[0] & 0x001f0000) >> 16; }
00018     virtual inline UInt_t IthValueOf(UInt_t* record, size_t iRow)
00019       { return GetLocPtr(record, iRow)[0] & 0x00000fff; }
00020     virtual inline UInt_t IthValueIsUnderThreshold(UInt_t* record, size_t iRow)
00021       { return (GetLocPtr(record, iRow)[0] & 0x00002000) >> 13; }
00022     virtual inline UInt_t IthValueIsOverflow(UInt_t* record, size_t iRow)
00023       { return (GetLocPtr(record, iRow)[0] & 0x00001000) >> 12; }
00024     virtual inline UInt_t IthValueIsValid(UInt_t* record, size_t iRow)
00025       { return ((GetLocPtr(record, iRow)[0] & 0x07000000) >> 24) == 0x000; }
00026 
00027     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "ORCaen792Model:qdc"; }
00028     virtual std::string GetValueName() { return "qdc"; }
00029 
00030     // for basic trees
00031     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 7; }
00032     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00033     virtual size_t GetNRows(UInt_t* record) { return NValuesOf(record); }
00034     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow);
00035 
00036   protected:
00037     virtual void LoadLocPtrs(UInt_t* record);
00038     virtual inline UInt_t IthWordIsHeader(UInt_t* record, size_t iWord)
00039       { return ((record[iWord] & 0x07000000) >> 24) == 0x010; }
00040     virtual inline UInt_t IthWordIsData(UInt_t* record, size_t iWord)
00041       { return ((record[iWord] & 0x07000000) >> 24) == 0x000 || ((record[iWord] & 0x07000000) >> 24) == 0x110; }
00042     virtual inline UInt_t IthWordIsEndOfBlock(UInt_t* record, size_t iWord)
00043       { return ((record[iWord] & 0x07000000) >> 24) == 0x100; }
00044     virtual inline size_t NChannelsInBlock(UInt_t* headerPtr)
00045       { return (headerPtr[0] & 0x00003700) >> 8; }
00046     virtual UInt_t* GetLocPtr(UInt_t* record, size_t i);
00047     std::vector<UInt_t*> fLocPtrs;
00048     UInt_t* fRecord;
00049 };
